The latest project releases can now be downloaded from [https://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/ SourceForge] :

=Windows=

There are three installers available for the Windows platform:

  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/pms-1.90.0-setup-full-x64.exe/download pms-1.90.0-setup-full-x64.exe (Windows 64 bit installer, includes Java)]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/pms-1.90.0-setup-full.exe/download pms-1.90.0-setup-full.exe (Windows 32 bit installer, includes Java)]
  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/pms-1.90.0-setup-without-jre.exe/download pms-1.90.0-setup-without-jre.exe (Windows 32 bit installer, no Java included)]

=Mac OS X=

There is an installer available for Mac OS X:

  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/pms-1.90.0-setup-macosx.tar.gz/download pms-1.90.0-setup-macosx.tar.gz (Mac OS X 10.6+ installer, Java included)]

=Linux=

There is one archive with binaries available for Linux:

  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ps3mediaserver/files/pms-1.90.0-generic-linux-unix.tar.gz/download pms-1.90.0-generic-linux-unix.tar.gz (Linux archive)]
